alert.note: Alert for Cedar (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 9:55PM CDT until May 07 at 8:46PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Sac River near Caplinger Mills affecting Cedar County. For the Sac River Basin...including Caplinger Mills...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sac River near Caplinger Mills. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, flood waters affect low lying areas near the river including farmland along Highway N and between Highway W and Caplinger Mills. Cedar Creek...a tributary of the Sac River backwaters and floods portions of Highway 39 and south of Cedar Springs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 21.4 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. Thursday evening at 1000 PM CDT.
